description:
This application is a HP webOS city guide to accompany you on your visit to London, England.

It contains a large OFFLINE database of points of interest including, bars, museums and tourist attractions we believe are most worth seeing!
(Note, Buckingham palace is listed in the west section contrary to the comment!!)

With help from your GPS it will indicate the disance and direction to the nearest sight.

This application operates completely offline meaning you don't have to connect to the internet to locate the destination.

An optional link will locate the spot for you in google maps which will require an internet connection.

We hope you like it and hope you have a great visit in this great city!
Regards,
John
versionNote:
Some Restaurants and theatres added.
Distance also displays in miles.
